input:
Job Title: Computer Programmer
Job Description: Writing and Modifying Code: Computer programmers write code in various languages (like C++, Java, Python) to implement software functionalities. They also modify existing code to fix bugs, add new features, or improve performance. Testing and Debugging: Programmers are responsible for testing their code to ensure it works as intended and for identifying and fixing any errors or bugs. Collaborating with Developers: They work closely with software developers, designers, and other IT professionals to understand requirements and ensure the software is built according to specifications. Creating Documentation: Programmers may be involved in creating documentation for the code they write, which can include user manuals or technical specifications. Maintaining and Updating Software: They ensure that existing software remains functional and up-to-date by addressing issues and incorporating new features or changes. Skills Required: Programming Languages: Proficiency in various programming languages is crucial, including Java, Python, C++, and others, depending on the specific job requirements. Problem-Solving: Computer programmers need strong problem-solving skills to identify and resolve issues in code and software. Logical Thinking: They must be able to think logically and understand complex systems to effectively design and implement solutions. Attention to Detail: Precision and attention to detail are essential for writing accurate and efficient code. Communication: Strong communication skills are necessary for collaborating with team members and communicating technical information.

output.Job Summary: Responsible for writing, testing, and maintaining code to meet software specifications, collaborating with development teams, and ensuring software quality and performance.
Skills: Proficiency in programming languages (Java, Python, C++)
